pagesCount.description: Total number of pages in the content item.

isFrontPage.description: Indicates if the content item is on the front page.

pages.description: List of pages this content item is on.

lineBreaks.description: List of line breaks offsets in the content item (relative to textual content).

paragraphBreaks.description: List of paragraph breaks offsets in the content item (relative to textual content).

regionBreaks.description: List of region breaks offsets in the content item (relative to textual content).
